data.title: Brondby IF vs Legia Warszawa Prediction, Lineups & Odds
data.meta_description: Brondby IF vs Legia Warszawa prediction and betting tips. Europa Conference League preview with odds, team news and lineups. Free football predictions.
data.text:
Expect Goals Between Brondby and Legia Warszawa

The beauty of our betting prediction is that it doesn’t matter if Brondby IF or Legia Warszawa score the goals. We simply need Over 2.5 Goals and that’s trading at 1.77.

Match Preview

Brondby most recently played an away Superliga clash against Lyngby which was a 2-0 win. Mathias Kvistgaarden and Clement Bischoff were the goalscorers at Lyngby Stadion.

Legia Warszawa lost against Piast Gliwice in their last match, losing the Ekstraklasa clash 2-1. Blaz Kramer scored in the game at Polish Army, with Legia Warszawa having three shots on target and they had 53% of possession.

Brondby – Last 10 Competitive Games

5 wins, 3 losses and 2 draws, averaging 2.3 goals from 14.7 attempts and 5.2 shots on goal. Brondby IF have had 55.1% possession, 509.4 passes and 6.5 corners per match. On average, they have conceded 1.5 goals from 10.9 attempts and 3.3 shots on goal, while their opponents have earned 4.9 corners.

Mathias Kvistgaarden, Ohi Anthony Omoijuanfo, Emmanuel Yeboah and Nicolai Vallys are the top scorers with 3 goals each, while Nicolai Vallys has 3. Daniel Wass, Mathias Kvistgaarden and Sebastian Sebulonsen have recorded the most assists with 3 apiece. Meanwhile, goalkeeper Patrick Pentz has kept 4 clean sheets.

Legia Warszawa – Last 10 Competitive Games

Legia Warszawa have won 8 and lost 2, with an average of 4.8 shots on goal, 12.9 attempts and 2.3 goals. They average 53.7% possession, 4.7 corners awarded and 2.6 corners against, while 0.8 goals have been conceded from 9.0 attempts and 1.9 shots on goal.

Marc Gual has top scored with 5, while Blaz Kramer, Bartosz Kapustka and Luquinhas are next on 2. Ryoya Morishita and Josue are the top assist makers, managing 3 in the last 10 games.

Confirmed Lineups

Brondby (confirmed lineup): Patrick Pentz, Frederik Alves Ibsen, Rasmus Lauritsen, Jacob Rasmussen, Sebastian Sebulonsen, Yuito Suzuki, Daniel Wass, Noah Nartey, Clement Bischoff, Mathias Kvistgaarden, Filip Bundgaard.

Legia Warszawa (confirmed lineup): Kacper Tobiasz, Radovan Pankov, Rafal Augustyniak, Sergio Barcia, Patryk Kun, Bartosz Kapustka, Jurgen Celhaka, Luquinhas, Ruben Vinagre, Marc Gual, Tomas Pekhart.

Expert Europa Conference League Analysis

Injuries and suspensions can affect the overall outcome and we use this information as well as the latest form guide. The same applies to the stats so that we can get the best understanding of how things might pan out.

Key Brondby IF vs Legia Warszawa stats:

Brondby IF have scored 2 or more goals in 8 of their past 10 home matches

In 7 of the last 10 Brondby IF home matches, there have been Over 2.5 Goals

Brondby IF have conceded 2 or more goals in 5 of their last 10 home matches

In 7 of the last 10 Legia Warszawa away matches, there have been Over 2.5 Goals

Legia Warszawa have scored 2 or more goals in 6 of their past 10 away matches

Providing three or more goals are scored in this Europa Conference League clash, we will win with our tip of Over 2.5 Goals. Let’s hope that we see an attacking game.

If you’re looking for bigger odds, you can have a bang on Over 3.5 Goals and that is a significantly larger price with the bookies.

Published 05:25, 06 August 2024
